channel.title: Knowledge is needed!
channel.description:
I need someone with the ability to help me on creating item requirements such as;
Need 60 attack to be able to equip dds. Need 45 def to be able to equip beserker helmet. Need 80 def to be able to equip bandos tasset.

item.title: Knowledge is needed!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search for

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

After it add Something like this

if (ItemID == ITEMID) { return LVLUWANTTHEMTOHAVE; }

ITEMID means = The id of the item
LVLUWANTTHEMTOHAVE = level they have to have to wear it.

Note` That is only for defence

If you want them to be like att or str u search for like

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

or

public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) {

And do the same thing you would do as i showed you the first time.

HOpe that helped.

Read full topic
